name: It's Cold Down Here
description:
SA Game Jam 72 hour submission

Explore an empty, underwater world in this narrative puzzle game.

Discover the strange inhabitants and help them out.

Note!! Our second upload (BUGFIX-8_23 - Uploaded 8:23pm on 10/25) fixes one critical error which stops you from progressing upon revisiting a location

Note (2)!! The third upload (BUGFIX-9_10) is actually playable through to the end :) whoopsie.
